allPortfolioInfo.about: Innkeeper is a job-tech venture that provides talent development and matching services to corporations and startups. The platform is driven by the need to support organizations with top African talents for tech and tech-related roles. Through their constant interactions with employers, they identify the skill-set required to remain relevant in the workplace, especially in the tech space. With a blended learning approach, Innkeeper facilitates access to learning opportunities for in-demand skills with an emphasis on mentorship. As a result of their continuous interactions with employers, they are able to quickly spot the gaps, which ensures having an updated curriculum necessary to fill the skill gaps. As a result, they prioritize upskilling young people in these in-demand tech skills in order to improve their employability and close talent skill gaps

allPortfolioTractions.title: Tech talent trained.
allPortfolioTractions.details: In the past 16 months of Innkeeperâ€™s existence, they have trained over 300+ young African talents for tech and tech-related roles.

allPortfolioTractions.title: Alumni employed
allPortfolioTractions.details: Innkeeper has placed over 80% of our trainees in jobs, either internships or entry roles, to enable them to progress on their tech journey and also provide a post-training community that helps them grow and creates opportunities to be mentored.

allPortfolioTractions.title: Partnerships
allPortfolioTractions.details: As a result of the innkeeper's impact-driven approach to support organization, they have top-notch African talents with the partnership of over 40 organizations and entrepreneurs to meet their talent needs and provide solutions to their human capital development problems.

HavenPortfolioInfo.about: Haven Edu-Services is an extra-curricular childhood educational organization focused on providing training content related to Technology, Languages, and Arts for children/Pre-teenagers ages 4-16.

HavenPortfolioTractions.title: School partnerships
HavenPortfolioTractions.details: As a result of the Haven Edu-Services impact-driven approach to equipping children, they have top-notch African skills with the partnership of over 4 schools to meet their talent needs and provide solutions to CHILDHOOD EDUCATION SERVICES

HavenPortfolioTractions.title: Summer Programs
HavenPortfolioTractions.details: With the help of schools ,they have successfully had over 5  summer  programs of their training.

HavenPortfolioTractions.title: Outsourced sessions
HavenPortfolioTractions.details: Partnership with different schools, they have been able to achieve strategic areas of learning like multi-language art in French, taekwondo, etc.

MindAfrikPortfolioInfo.about: MindAfrik is an online platform focused on mental health that connects certified and qualified counselors to people who need their services.

EaseSoilessPortfolioInfo.about: Ease soilless is a company dedicated to adding value to modern farming through the use of sustainable, environment-friendly soilless technology. We hope to make urban farming attractive to households and Nigerian youth.
